title: ATT&CK Mappings Unified Schema
description: Defines the data elements and properties of Mappings Explorer projects

metadata.description: Properties that apply to all mappings in a project.

mapping_version.description: The version of the mapping project.

attack_version.description: The version of ATT&CK used to source the objects included in this mapping.

creation_date.description: Creation date of this mapping file. Format: (MM/DD/YYYY) 1/21/2021

last_update.description: Last update date of this mapping file. Format: (MM/DD/YYYY) 1/21/2021

mapping_framework.description: The group of objects being mapped to ATT&CK.

mapping_framework_version_scheme.description: How the Mapping Framework is versioned.

author.description: The author of this mapping file.

contact.description: The email address of the author.

organization.description: The organization associated with the author.

mapping_types.description: The mappings types that are associated with each Framework.

description.description: A description of the mapping type.

mapping_object.description: A single mapping between framework object and ATT&CK object.

attack_object_id.description: The unique identifier of the ATT&CK object being mapped. (T1648)

attack_object_name.description: The name of the ATT&CK object. (Serverless Execution)

capability_id.description: Unique identifier of the framework object being mapped.

capability_description.description: Name or description of framework object

comments.description: Used to document assumptions, circumstances, or other information regarding the mapping

references.description: A list of links to documentation that provides additional detail in understanding the data contained in this mapping. (A link to the documentation for a security control.)

mapping_type.description: Mapping type has framework-specific values. This property describes how the capability_id and attack_object_id are related.

score_category.description: Assessment of the effectiveness of the mitigations provided. (Protect, Detect, Respond)

related_score.description: When the ATT&CK object ID is a sub-technique, related score contains the parent technique ID.
